languages.text: "Лжешь. Стая Зловещий вой не бегает от сражений". {n}На возмутительное высказывание Ульфар отвечает удивительно спокойно, только трескучий мороз смерти, рожденный его голосом и пронесшийся по залу, заставляет волосы всех присутствующих встать дыбом.{/n}

"You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лжешь. Стая Зловещий вой не бегает от сражений". {n}На возмутительное высказывание Ульфар отвечает удивительно спокойно, только трескучий мороз смерти, рожденный его голосом и пронесшийся по залу, заставляет волосы всех присутствующих встать дыбом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You're lying. The Famehungry never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born out of his voice and carried across the hall makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

"You're lying. The Famehungry never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born out of his voice and carried across the hall makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

"You're lying. The Famehungry never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born out of his voice, and carried across the hall makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

"You're lying. The Famehungry never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born out of his voice, and carried across the hall makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

"You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

"You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

languages.text: “你在说谎，怒嚎者从来不会逃避战斗。”{n}乌尔法的回答出奇地平静，但他的声音中却透露着宛如死亡的冰冷寒意，传遍整个房间，每个人身上的寒毛都竖了起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你在说谎，怒嚎者从来不会逃避战斗。”{n}乌尔法的回答出奇地平静，但他的声音中却透露着宛如死亡的冰冷寒意，传遍整个房间，每个人身上的寒毛都竖了起来。{/n}

languages.text: 「お前は嘘を付いている。破滅の咆哮が戦から逃げるはずがない」{n}とんでもない主張に対するウルファーの回答は、驚くほど落ち着いていた。その声の凍り付くような冷たさが部屋全体に響き渡り、その場にいる全員の髪の毛を逆立たせた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前は嘘を付いている。破滅の咆哮が戦から逃げるはずがない」{n}とんでもない主張に対するウルファーの回答は、驚くほど落ち着いていた。その声の凍り付くような冷たさが部屋全体に響き渡り、その場にいる全員の髪の毛を逆立たせた。{/n}

languages.text: «Miente. El Aullido Torvo nunca huye de una batalla». {n}La respuesta de Ulfar a la indignante afirmación es sorprendentemente tranquila. El gélido escalofrío de la muerte que emana de su voz y llena la sala pone los pelos de punta a todo el mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Miente. El Aullido Torvo nunca huye de una batalla». {n}La respuesta de Ulfar a la indignante afirmación es sorprendentemente tranquila. El gélido escalofrío de la muerte que emana de su voz y llena la sala pone los pelos de punta a todo el mundo.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr lügt. Das Baleful-Howl-Rudel flieht nie vor einer Schlacht." {n}Ulfars Antwort auf die unerhörte Behauptung fällt überraschend ruhig aus. Allein die frostige Kälte des Todes in seiner Stimme, die die ganze Halle erfasst, lässt allen die Haare zu Berge stehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr lügt. Die Famehungry fliehen nie vor einer Schlacht." {n}Ulfars Antwort auf die unerhörte Behauptung fällt überraschend ruhig aus. Nur die frostige Kälte des Todes, die in seiner Stimme mitschwingt und durch die Halle getragen wird, lässt allen die Haare zu Berge stehen.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous mentez. Les Hurleurs sanguinaires ne fuient jamais un combat, » {n}conteste Ulfar, qui demeure étonnamment calme au vu des circonstances. Répercuté sur les murs de la pièce, le ton de sa voix, en revanche, est tellement glacial qu'il fait froid dans le dos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous mentez. Les Hurleurs sanguinaires ne fuient jamais un combat, » {n}conteste Ulfar, qui demeure étonnamment calme au vu des circonstances. Répercuté sur les murs de la pièce, le ton de sa voix, en revanche, est tellement glacial qu'il fait froid dans le dos.{/n}

languages.text: "Yalan. Uğursuz Uluma, muharebeden asla kaçmaz." {n}Ulfar, bu uçuk iddianın karşısında tuhaf derecede sakin kalıyor. Fakat sesinden doğup odadaki herkesin tüylerini ürperten o ölüm soğuğu yine eksik olmuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You lie. The Baleful Howl never run from battle." {n}Ulfar's reply to the outrageous claim is surprisingly calm. Only the frosty chill of death born of his voice and carried across the room makes everyone's hair stand on end.{/n}
